page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA.
page.content: A Monday in my life begins at 8am when I get up and get ready for school. At 8.15 I have a breakfast of toast, cereal or egg. At 8.25 I feed the hens and collect the eggs. 8.35 I cycle to Uig Hall to meet the school car. 9.30 I start school and do maths and mental arithmetic. 11.00 I have an interval and play with my friends at ball or skipping. 11.20 I do reading and work with the computer. 12.15 I have lunch and go out to play. 1.30 I do art, projects and sometimes gardening. 3.45 I get the school car home, feed the hens and go out to play. At 5.00 I have a tea of pancakes then change into my Brownie uniform. At 9.30 I go to bed.
